short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A minimal calendar popup that lets you open dates in Google Calendar easily

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tiny Calendar provides an easy to use date picker dropdown which lets you quickly finds dates or days of the week and open them in Google Calendar with a  single click. I made it because it can be slow to check specific dates in the future with Google Calendar. 

The extension is intentionally simple
